text: Judith Krantz (January 9, 1928 - June 22, 2019) was an American author. She mostly wrote romance novels. One of them is Till We Meet Again. She wrote freelance articles for Cosmopolitan and Ladies' Home Journal. She was born in New York City. Krantz died on June 22, 2019, at her home in the Bel Air neighborhood of Los Angeles. She was 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American novelists Category:Writers from New York City
title: Judith Krantz
